name: Ben Harris
what_you_do: Online marketing professional focused on sales funnels, affiliate program growth, and business development. Co-founded MB Nutrition and has led departments at ClickFunnels and ClickBank.
who_you_serve: Business owners and entrepreneurs looking to grow sales through online marketing and sales funnels.
social_proof: Co-founded MB Nutrition whose flagship product F-16 was the top-rated pre-workout supplement in the United States in 2016; business was successfully acquired in 2017; helped scale the ClickFunnels affiliate program to be one of the largest in the industry.
business_focus: Helping businesses grow through sales funnels, lead generation strategies, and affiliate marketing.
service_provided: Business development, affiliate program management, sales funnel strategy, coaching
